==== foo.tsx (1 errors) ====
    import React = require('react');
                           ~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2307: Cannot find module 'react' or its corresponding type declarations.
    
    type TypeProps = { foo?: boolean; };
    interface InterfaceProps { foo?: boolean; }
    
    function Foo<T>() {
        return null;
    }
    
    <>
        {/* JsxSelfClosingElement */}
        <Foo<unknown> />
        <Foo<string> />
        <Foo<boolean> />
        <Foo<object> />
        <Foo<null> />
        <Foo<any> />
        <Foo<never> />
        <Foo<undefined> />
        <Foo<TypeProps> />
        <Foo<InterfaceProps> />
    
        {/* JsxOpeningElement */}
        <Foo<unknown>></Foo>
        <Foo<string>></Foo>
        <Foo<boolean>></Foo>
        <Foo<object>></Foo>
        <Foo<null>></Foo>
        <Foo<any>></Foo>
        <Foo<never>></Foo>
        <Foo<undefined>></Foo>
        <Foo<TypeProps>></Foo>
        <Foo<InterfaceProps>></Foo>
    </>
